artist: Author: Fundi; Printer: Union Place, London; Publisher: News From Everywhere, London

description: Saddle stitched binding, photographic image of three figure with designs and letterpress text printed in offset lithography on coated paper covers; 21 pp.
title: None Shall Escape: Radical Perpectives in the Caribbean
